extracted_network_signals.ai_analysis: Autonomous detection: Unusual ISP for user profile
Autonomous alert: Rapid geographic transition detected

risk_factors: AI-detected geographic inconsistency / impossible travel scenario
Autonomous pattern recognition: Multiple distinct ISPs in short timeframe (Bharti Airtel in India and Olorin in the US)
Machine learning model flagged high-risk network behavior
anomaly_details: Autonomous system detected login from IP 223.185.128.58 (Bharti Airtel) at 2025-05-15T06:24:23.466-07:00 and then from IP 207.207.181.8 (Olorin) at 2025-05-15T06:31:40.056-07:00, indicating impossible travel scenario.
AI confidence: 95% - Pattern matches known fraud scenarios
network_risk_assessment.summary: Autonomous AI analysis: User demonstrates highly suspicious cross-country ISP usage within minutes. AI recommends immediate account lockdown and investigation.
network_risk_assessment.thoughts: Autonomous network analysis detected two IPs—one in India, the other in the US—accessed within a 7-minute interval. AI pattern recognition indicates 95% probability of fraudulent activity. Session IDs reveal separate access points at close times, triggering automatic high-risk classification. Recommend immediate intervention.
